text: Assertion: The tyres of aircrafts are slightly conducting. Reason: If a conductor is connected to ground, the extra charge induced on conductor will flow to ground.

options.a: Both (A) and (R) are correct and (R) is not the correct explanation of (A)
options.b: (A) is correct but (R) is not correct
options.c: (A) is not correct but (R) is correct
options.d: Both (A) and (R) are correct and (R) is the correct explanation of (A)

hint: During take-off and landing, the friction between tyres and the run way may cause electrification of tyres. Due to conducting nature of tyre, the charge so collected is conducted to a ground and electrical sparking is avoided.
